page.title: 10RECREATION/ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: {Recreational facilities}in Haddington include a bowling green, football and rugby fields and squash and tennis courts near to the swimming pool,all of which have been developed for use by club members. Other pursuits such as athletics, angling in the River Tyne, riding in the Lammermuir Hills and playing in the various hockey teams, provide recreational activities for all age groups.{The Neilson Park provides{open space}for the individual to do as he or she wants.{ { {ARTS & CRAFTS }Studio 1 produces {jewellery}made from titanium. Margery Clinton produces high quality{pottery.
